name: Find all SPs with an Entra ID role

queryList.query: MATCH (sps_excluding_builtin) WHERE (sps_excluding_builtin:_VAR_all_service-principals-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (sps_excluding_builtin)-[:AZHasRole]->(:AZRole) RETURN p

name: Find all SPs with a Tier-0 application permission

queryList.query: MATCH (sps_excluding_builtin) WHERE (sps_excluding_builtin:_VAR_all_service-principals-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (sps_excluding_builtin)-[entra_app_permissions_t0:_VAR_all-entra-app-permissions-in-t0]->(n) RETURN p

name: Find all SPs with a Tier-1 application permission

queryList.query: MATCH (sps_excluding_builtin) WHERE (sps_excluding_builtin:_VAR_all_service-principals-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (sps_excluding_builtin)-[entra_app_permissions_t1:_VAR_all-entra-app-permissions-in-t1]->(n) RETURN p

name: Find all principals with an abusable permission on MS Graph
Find all SPs with Azure permissions on Management Groups

queryList.query: MATCH (sps_excluding_builtin) WHERE (sps_excluding_builtin:_VAR_all_service-principals-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (sps_excluding_builtin)-[r]->(:AZManagementGroup) RETURN p

name: Find all SPs with Azure permissions on Subscriptions

queryList.query: MATCH (sps_excluding_builtin) WHERE (sps_excluding_builtin:_VAR_all_service-principals-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (sps_excluding_builtin)-[r]->(:AZSubscription) RETURN p

name: Find all SPs with Azure permissions on Resource Groups

queryList.query: MATCH (sps_excluding_builtin) WHERE (sps_excluding_builtin:_VAR_all_service-principals-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (sps_excluding_builtin)-[r]->(:AZResourceGroup) RETURN p

name: Find all SPs with Azure permissions on individual resources

queryList.query: MATCH (sps_excluding_builtin) WHERE (sps_excluding_builtin:_VAR_all_service-principals-excluding-built-in) MATCH (all_az_resources) WHERE (all_az_resources:_VAR_all-az-resources) MATCH p = (sps_excluding_builtin)-[r]->(all_az_resources) RETURN p

name: Find all SPs with access to a Key Vault's data plane

queryList.query: MATCH (node) WHERE (node:AZServicePrincipal AND node.serviceprincipaltype = 'Application') MATCH p = (node)-[r:AZKeyVaultContributor|AZGetCertificates|AZGetKeys|AZGetSecrets]->(:AZKeyVault) RETURN p
